1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes, drained,2 chipotle chiles in adobo sauce, or more to taste,1 ½ tablespoons vegetable oil,1 large white onion, thinly sliced,3 cloves garlic, minced,1 ½ cups chicken broth,1 dash roasted ground cumin,1 dash dried oregano,1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste,1 (16 ounce) package tortilla chips,1 (8 ounce) package shredded Mexican cheese blend,5 ounces crumbled cotija cheese,1 whole cooked chicken, deboned and shredded,⅔ cup chopped green onions, divided,1 cup chopped cilantro, divided,1 (8 ounce) carton sour cream, divided,,
